name: Subject 22
description:
You are thrown into an unknown environment. Your steps echos as you walk, darkness surrounds you and you are only left with a flashlight and some kind of bioluminescent spray.

The room doesn’t seem natural, everything’s far too geometrical and there’s a metallic sheen on the floors and walls. 

Now that you notice, this flashlight doesn’t seem ordinary either. When you turn it off, you see that items within its light beam disappear. Turning the flashlight back on, the items that disappeared before rematerializes in front of you, but they seem off. They seem to float as if gravity doesn’t affect them anymore.

With all this strangeness, there's only one thing that remains certain. There’s only one way out. 

Controls
Left Click to toggle your Flashlight

Right Click to spray trackers 
(This is only available when the flashlight is off)

WASD to walk

Space to Jump
